member.name: T:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags
member.summary: Flags for the RPC client builder.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.GenerateConstructorProperties
member.summary: Generate public properties on the client to create defined complex types.
member.remarks: If not specified then constructors will be defined on the types themselves.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.InsertBreakpoints
member.summary: Insert breakpoints into the start of every generated method. Also enables debugging.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.DisableCalculatedCorrelations
member.summary: Disable calculated correlation information. This will prevent automatic updating of array and string lengths based on other parameters or fields. This might result in unexpected behavior or call failures. This won't disable correlations for union types or constant correlations.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.NoNamespace
member.summary: Don't emit any namespace, normally not specifying a namespace will auto-generate one.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.UnsignedChar
member.summary: Output FC_CHAR as if the original compiler had specified unsigned char types. Basically converts System.SByte to System.Byte where needed which makes the methods easier to use.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.StructureReturn
member.summary: Return ref/out parameters via a structure rather than requiring ref/out parameters in client methods.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.HideWrappedMethods
member.summary: When using StructureReturn hide the original out/ref methods.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.GenerateComplexTypeEncodeMethods
member.summary: Generate encode/decode methods for complex types.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.ExcludeVariableSourceText
member.summary: Exclude any text in the source code which can change between generations.

member.name: F:NtApiDotNet.Win32.Rpc.RpcClientBuilderFlags.PointerComplexTypeDecoders
member.summary: Wrap complex type decoders with a unique pointer.

member.name: M:NtApiDotNet.Win32.RpcEndpointMapper.FindAlpcEndpointForInterface(System.Guid,System.Version)
member.summary: Finds ALPC endpoints which allows for the server binding. This brute forces all ALPC ports to try and find something which will accept the bind.
member.remarks: This could hang if the ALPC port is owned by a suspended process.

member.name: M:NtApiDotNet.Win32.RpcEndpointMapper.FindFirstAlpcEndpointForInterface(System.Guid,System.Version)

member.remarks: This could hang if the ALPC port is owned by a suspended process.
member.returns: The first RPC endpoints which can bind the interface. Throws exception if nothing found.

member.returns: The RPC binding string. Empty string if it doesn't exist or the lookup failed.
